price: Ndërsa atyre që besojnë dhe punojnë vepra të mira, Zoti do t’u japë shpërblimin e merituar. Allahu nuk i do punëmbrapshtët.”
arabic: وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ فَيُوَفِّيهِمۡ أُجُورَهُمۡۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti fayuwaffīhim ujūrahum wal-lahu lā yuḥibbu al-ẓālimīna
translations: then He will grant them in full
